Threat intelligence feeds identifying VP.Action: Ingest threat intelligence feeds containing indicators (IPs, domains, certificate hashes, service banners) associated with adversary-acquired VPS infrastructure. Cross-reference historical and current internal network logs (e.g., Zeek conn.log, Zeek ssl.log) against these indicators.

Outbound connections from the organizati.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and ssl.log for outbound connections to IP addresses or domains identified in threat intelligence feeds or exhibiting unusual characteristics (e.g., connections to rare ports, short-lived connections to newly registered domains). Use frequency analysis or outlier detection on destination IPs/domains and ports to identify anomalous connections.
